original_text: For the Lord will have compassion on Jacob and will again choose Israel, and will set them in their own land, and sojourners will join them and will attach themselves to the house of Jacob.
korean_text: 여호와께서 야곱을 긍휼히 여기시며 이스라엘을 다시 택하여 그들의 땅에 두시리니 나그네 된 자가 야곱 족속과 연합하여 그들에게 예속될 것이며

sentences.original_text: For the Lord will have compassion on Jacob
and will set them in their own land
and will attach themselves to the house of Jacob
